body.name: Sony 3 x SRG-X400 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output, SRGL-4K 4K License Included, RM-IP500/1 Remote Controller, 3 x Cat5e Ethernet Cable, Cleaning Set, 3 x HDMI Cable (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 30 mins.
features: Bundle Includes: 3 - Sony SRG-X400 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output (White), 3 - Sony SRGL-4K 4K License Included, 1 - Sony RM-IP500/1 Professional Remote Controller for Select Sony PTZ Cameras, 3 - Cat5e Ethernet Cable, 1 - Cleaning Set, 3 - HDMI Cable

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: The SRG-X400 PTZ camera, with its superior image quality and efficient IP production workflow, is designed to capture every perspective. This remote-controlled camera is perfect for various settings, including classrooms, meeting rooms, places of worship, lecture theaters, and healthcare facilities.

CAPTURES SUPERIOR IMAGES, EVEN IN DIM LIGHT: The highly sensitive 1/2.5-type Exmor R sensor ensures the capture of high-quality images with minimal noise, even in environments with poor lighting. PERFECT FOR LECTURE RECORDING - Pair the camera with the AI-powered REA-C1000 Edge Analytics Appliance for seamless tracking of the speaker’s movements and automatic creation of a cut-out image of the speaker.

NDI|HX Compatibility: The system supports NDI|HX, which can be enabled through an optional license. This feature facilitates cost-effective integration into school studio systems by allowing flexible configuration with other devices on the network that are NDI-enabled. This feature allows you to view images remotely via the Internet using a web browser. It also supports RTSP for enhanced viewing capabilities.

FAST, FUSS-FREE SET-UP - The new Picture Setting File function can apply the same camera settings among multiple cameras for fast set-up. Key Features: Up to 1920 x 1080 Resolution at 60 fps | 1/2.5" Exmor R CMOS Sensor |3G-SDI, HDMI and Ethernet Output. THE SONY RM-IP500/1 REMOTE - This unit incorporates a joystick for pan, tilt, and zoom control, and has the capability of controlling up to 100 separate cameras over IP.
body.description: The Sony SRG-X400 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output is designed to record every perspective in meetings and lectures. This camera, right out of the box, is capable of recording video at a resolution of up to 1920 x 1080 at 60 fps. An optional license is available for those who wish to enhance the camera’s performance to UHD 4K 3840 x 2160. The camera features an 8.3MP CMOS sensor and a 4.4-88.0mm lens, providing a field of view of up to 70 degrees. The Clear Image Zoom Technology can magnify the 20x optical zoom to up to 40x, enabling close-ups that fill the frame in Full HD. .Manufacturer Included Items:Sony SRG-X400 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output (White, 4K Upgradable) Sony SRGL-4K 4K License IncludedAC Power AdapterIR Remote Commander2 x Ceiling BracketsWire Rope9 x M3x8 Mounting ScrewsM2.6x6 ScrewHDMI Cable ClampIncluded Items3 x Sony SRG-X400 1080p PTZ Camera with HDMI, IP & 3G-SDI Output (White)1 x Sony RM-IP500/1 Professional Remote Controller for Select Sony PTZ Cameras3 x Cat5e Ethernet Cable 1 x Cleaning Set3 x HDMI Cable
